name: Saiyan Battle Z
description:
Attention！！The first Super Saiyan mobile game, Saiyan Battle Z, arrived on Earth. The perfect combination of animation element and card game opens a new adventure. We contain a full series of DB fighters and the most authentic battle scene! Collect your favorite character and cultivate the strongest team in the universe! Enjoy the most incisive aerial battles and chase the climax of the universe! what are you waiting for？Come with me!! Start a new adventure and journey with saiyan ！！
Feature:
Combat system:
Each character has a unique combat mechanism and different 3D displays of picture.
Gear system:
Different characters have different collocations of gear. Collecting a set of legends + gear will bring a enormous attribute bonus to your character.
Bond relationship:
Collecting all characters can effectively activate the bond relationship. The attribute of bond relationship will be improved after the upgrade of the character, which will bring a unexpected effects in the battle.
